resources.string:
• If leaves are present you will see the left then right pattern
  • If there are no leaves than you can tell it is poison ivy by the hairy vine
  • Can often climb for an amount and then branch out looking for sun
  • Often will be over the trail where someone would push the branch out of the way and have a rude surprise in the morning!

• Shrubs will grow a host up and have a shrub at the top
  • They can climb up buildings, fences, signs and more
  • Can very rarely attach to their own vines and grow higher
This project requires the use of location! Without it, the collected data will not be helpful. Please turn on location services and try again.
